trans-unit.source: Implemented by the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> class to determine if the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.AutoCompleteAttribute" /> class attribute is set to <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" /> for a remote method invocation.
trans-unit.target: Implementata dalla classe <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> per determinare se l'attributo della classe <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.AutoCompleteAttribute" /> è impostato su <see langword="true" /> o <see langword="false" /> per una chiamata a un metodo remoto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch> interface does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch> interfaccia non è necessario implementare direttamente nel codice.

trans-unit.source: It is used internally by the .NET Framework infrastructure.
The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.AutoCompleteAttribute> class attribute ensures that, in the COM+ context, the object's done bit is automatically set to `true` once the method returns.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.AutoCompleteAttribute> attributo class garantisce che, in contesto COM+, i bit di completamento dell'oggetto viene automaticamente impostato su `true` dopo il metodo restituisce.

trans-unit.source: The object can then be deactivated.
The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch> interface methods do not appear in the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> class interface.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch> metodi di interfaccia non vengono visualizzati il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> interfaccia della classe.
In alternativa, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> implementa in modo esplicito <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch>.

trans-unit.source: A string to be converted into a request object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Stringa da convertire in un oggetto richiesta che implementa l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" />.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that, in the COM+ context, the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> class object's done bit is set to <see langword="true" /> after a remote method invocation.
trans-unit.target: Garantisce che, nel contesto COM+, il bit di completamento (done) dell'oggetto della classe <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> sia impostato su <see langword="true" /> dopo una chiamata a un metodo remoto.

trans-unit.source: A string converted from a response object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Stringa convertita da un oggetto risposta che implementa l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch.RemoteDispatchAutoDone%2A> method does not belong to the published interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> class and does not need to be implemented elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch.RemoteDispatchAutoDone%2A> (metodo) non appartiene all'interfaccia pubblicata del <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> classe e non deve essere implementata in un' posizione.

trans-unit.source: A string to be converted into a request object implementing the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Stringa da convertire in un oggetto richiesta che implementa l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage" />.

trans-unit.source: Does not ensure that, in the COM+ context, the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> class object's done bit is set to <see langword="true" /> after a remote method invocation.
trans-unit.target: Non garantisce che, nel contesto COM+, il bit di completamento dell'oggetto della classe <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent" /> sia impostato su <see langword="true" /> dopo una chiamata a un metodo remoto.

trans-unit.source: A string converted from a response object implementing the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Stringa convertita da un oggetto risposta che implementa l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch.RemoteDispatchNotAutoDone%2A> method does not belong to the published interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> class and does not need to be implemented elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch.RemoteDispatchNotAutoDone%2A> (metodo) non appartiene all'interfaccia pubblicata del <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent> classe e non deve essere implementata in un' posizione.
